pp1.3:6.1: Arukūpamacitto puggalo, vijjūpamacitto puggalo, vajirūpamacitto puggalo.
pp1.3:8.1: Avakujjapañño puggalo, ucchaṅgapañño puggalo, puthupañño puggalo.
pp1.3:9.1: Atthekacco puggalo kāmesu ca bhavesu ca avītarāgo, atthekacco puggalo kāmesu vītarāgo bhavesu avītarāgo, atthekacco puggalo kāmesu ca bhavesu ca vītarāgo.
pp1.3:10.1: Pāsāṇalekhūpamo puggalo, pathavilekhūpamo puggalo, udakalekhūpamo puggalo.
pp1.3:14.1: Atthekacco puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthekacco puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo, atthekacco puggalo sakkatvā garuṁ katvā sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupāsitabbo.
pp1.3:15.1: Atthekacco puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo, atthekacco puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo;
pp1.3:16.1: Atthekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī, samādhismiṁ mattaso kārī, paññāya mattaso kārī;
pp1.3:16.2: atthekacco puggalo sīlesu ca paripūrakārī, samādhismiñca paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī;
pp1.3:16.3: atthekacco puggalo sīlesu ca paripūrakārī, samādhismiñca paripūrakārī, paññāya ca paripūrakārī.
